1471400.name: The Thought Police Hotline: Episode 1 Demo
1471400.description:
In a world where privacy is almost nonexistent, John convinces the president of a false flag bomb plot to initiate military action against an organization that supports privacy. But was this his best course of action?

The Thought Police Hotline: Episode 1 is a comedy/ sci-fi visual novel, and is the first in a planned The Thought Police Hotline Season 1.

Gameplay

  • This is a visual novel so there isn't much gameplay.
  • You can click to move the dialogue forward.
